name: Daedalus (Epicwyvern)
description:
Daedalus is a concept for a surreal world. 

You seem to be trapped inside this "Box" for reasons beyond your knowing, and it seems like you are doomed to spend the rest of your days in this unusual hell.

That is until you start to hear the Source, and with it the secrets of the "Shift".

Maybe there is hope for you yet.

(Try not to mess with the cursor-lock, I know its a bit finicky!)
